content: an easy to follow delightful pattern for an adorable penguin the penguin can be made cheaply out of oddments of double knitting yarn the knitting pattern has clear row by row instructions and photographs to help you along the way you will need to be able to knit purl cast on and off increase and decrease change colours and sew seams all pieces are knitted flat on straight needles the penguin is a perfect size to join noah and all the animals on the knitables ark
